name: Sweep Tosho (Umamusume) LoRA
description:
Sweep Tosho (Umamusume) LoRA

This is the second LoRA I made, with one character supporting 3 outfits. Including racing uniform, school uniform and casual wear. Weight 0.8~1 will do well.

Please use this with respect for the original content, DO NOT publish any NSFW content.

I am using new training parameter, size is much smaller and retaining somewhat similar quality and style, enjoy!

Recommended prompt:

For more accurate result, please use the following prompt for each outfit

Racing outfit

sweep tosho \(umamusume\), shobufuku, witch hat, twintails, hair rings,  very long hair, black robe, white gloves, wide sleeves, white skirt, thigh boots

School Uniform

sweep tosho \(umamusume\), natsufuku, witch hat, very long hair, twintails, hair rings, pleated skirt, puffy short sleeves, purple bow, white skirt, sailor collar, sailor shirt, tracen school uniform, white thighhighs, brown footwear

Casual Wear

sweep tosho \(umamusume\), fudangi, hair bow, red bow, red dress, long sleeves, short necktie, very long hair, twintails, hair rings, white kneehighs, black footwear

*It is possible to switch between “witch hat” and “hair bow” to take on/off her headwear

**Use "thigh boots", "thighhighs", "footwear" only while drawing lower body or full body, or it will force AI to draw in full body scale.

***Use "from behind", "v-shaped eyebrows:1.5" in negative prompt may help

Known problem

For unknown reason school uniform may mix with racing outfit sometimes, add "shobufuku" in negative prompt if necessary.

For unknown reason eyebrows are constantly v-shaped, add "v-shaped eyebrows:1.5" in negative prompt may help her looks more relaxed.

Adding "horse tail" will generate tail but dont expect on right place.

Again, Please use this with respect for the original content, DO NOT publish any NSFW content.

Note: I may update my Special Week model to a smaller sized one if I have time.

(Oh she looks a bit older than her age? No way, THATs my taste lol)
